incidents.name: Public api downtime due to bad deploy

incident_updates.body: From 3:34-3:37pm PDT the Public API experienced a short period of downtime due to a bad deployment. Any requests that failed during that time should be retried.

Engineers investigated a service impacting outage for our UPS DAP integration from 19:20 UTC to 22:05 UTC. This impacted rating and label purchase. Other UPS accounts were not impacted. Engineers will continue to monitor and provide further updates if necessary. Any failed shipments can be retried.
This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.  Report processing continues to recover.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.  Report processing is recovering.
We are experiencing delays in user generated report creations. Engineers are investigating at this time.

incidents.name: Royal Mail International Export Services Outage

incident_updates.body: Royal Mail has started opening up international export services to select locations. Please refer to the carrier's statuspage for more in depth information: https://personal.help.royalmail.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/12556/~/service-update

Royal Mail is currently experiencing an outage affecting all international export services. This affects all Royal Mail international export services through EasyPost as well. Details of the outage can be found directly at Royal Mailâ€™s website here: https://personal.help.royalmail.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/12556/~/service-update. We will continue to monitor the situation and update when these services are restored.

At 1:20 UTC systems engineers preformed a necessary maintenance on our internal infrastructure. This resulted in a 5 minute window with an elevated 15% error rate on our public API. Any requests that failed during this time should be retried.
The Ontrac rating API errors have subsided and the service has recovered.

The Ontrac rating API is currently experiencing elevated rates of errors and request timeouts.

Ontrac has been notified, and our engineers will continue to monitor the performance of the Ontrac API.
This incident has been resolved, and we are seeing successful requests to the USPS Label BrokerÂ® service.
USPS has confirmed a fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The USPS has acknowledged the issue and have escalated it to their internal tech team.
Engineers are currently investigating an outage with the USPS Label BrokerÂ® service.
UPS's API error rate has returned to normal.
UPS's API has partially recovered and error response rates are trending lower. We are still monitoring the error rate.

The UPS/UPSMI rating API is experiencing elevated rates of errors and request timeouts.

UPS has been notified, and our engineers will continue to monitor the performance of the UPS API.
The issue is resolved and all asynchronous jobs have been processed.
Engineering has identified the issue and the asynchronous job backlog is being processed.
EasyPost is currently experiencing delays in asynchronous jobs (such as batches) affecting some users. Engineers are investigating.
This incident is resolved.
There is a delay of approximately 15 minutes in processing batch tasks (batch shipments, batch trackers, etc) for some users. Engineers expect it to clear shortly.
USPS tracking data is fully restored.
The backfill is continuing to run. All tracking data is expected to be fully restored by this evening.
The backfill is continuing to run. Tracking data is expected to be fully restored by tomorrow evening.
A fix has been implemented and USPS tracking details are beginning to backfill. Engineers are continuing to monitor the results.
We are receiving reports that USPS trackers are not updating. We have identified the cause of the outage and are actively communicating with the USPS to resolve the issue.
FedEx is fully operational
FedEx's upstream APIs are coming back online; engineers are monitoring.
FedEx is currently experiencing an outage affecting rating and label purchase. Engineers are investigating.
The error rate for Better Trucks has subsided. Engineers will continue to monitor the situation and tracking data will continue to update at its normal cadence.
The Better Trucks carrier is currently experiencing an outage affecting tracking. Engineers are investigating.
This incident has been resolved.
EasyPost engineers have put in place a workaround and DHL ECS is now functional. Engineers are continuing to monitor the situation.
We are currently experiencing an elevated rate of errors and timeouts communicating with DHL eCommerce Solutions (DHL ECS). Engineers are investigating.

incidents.name: Elevated error rates from USPS Label Broker service

incident_updates.body: The service appears to have recovered. Engineers will continue to monitor its performance.
USPS service appears stable and engineers are monitoring. Any previously failed label broker requests should be retried.
USPS is experiencing elevated failure rates in the Label Broker Service. Engineers are investigating.
This incident has been resolved.
All systems are operational; engineers are monitoring
EasyPost is currently experiencing degraded performance and elevated timeouts. Engineers are investigating.
All systems have been at full capacity for the last half-hour and we believe this incident is resolved.
Systems are operational now but with somewhat reduced capacity. Engineers are monitoring and bringing online additional capacity.
We are currently experiencing network issues in one of our datacenters causing elevated error rates. Engineers are investigating.

components.name: Address Verification
components.description: Address Verification (both standalone and part of label creation)

incident_updates.body: Engineers have identified the problem and pushed a fix. We will continue to monitor this on our end.
Engineers are investigating degraded performance from OSM Worldwide trackers.
The carrier appears to have recovered. Engineers will continue to monitor its performance.
We are continuing to monitor this issue
OnTrac Shipping and Tracking services are currently offline. Engineers are continuing to monitor the situation.
This has been stable for the last hour; marking as resolved
We have identified the cause of the slowdown and fixed it; all other jobs should be caught up.
EasyPost is currently experiencing delays in asynchronous jobs (such as batches) affecting some users. Engineering is investigating.
This has been stable for over an hour and we now consider this incident resolved.
This seems to be resolved as of approximately 13:00 Pacific time. Engineers continue to monitor.
FedEx's backend is currently experiencing intermittent spikes of slow performance, affecting EasyPost rating and purchase on FedEx carrier accounts
Everything has been stable for the last hour; we're considering this incident resolved at this time.
Everything has been stable for the last hour; we're considering this incident resolved at this time.
There was another brief spike of connectivity issues to AWS, but it's resolved. Engineers continue to monitor.
AWS performance appears to be degrading again. Engineers are investigating.
All services have been operational since approximately 07:50 Pacific time. Engineers continue to monitor.

There appears to be an outage occurring across west-coast AWS regions. This is not directly affecting EasyPost, but is preventing us from reaching many carriers and causing overall degraded performance. Engineers are investigating.
This is resolved.

Event notifications are slightly backed up due to widespread Internet issues today and customers may experience a delay receiving their notifications. EasyPost engineers are adding additional capacity to compensate.
FedEx performance has been stable for the last hour or so; this incident is resolved.
FedEx systems are responding again, although we're still seeing slower-than-usual performance. EasyPost engineers continue to monitor the situation.

FedEx has acknowledged an outage of their online services platform: "We are currently experiencing intermittent technical difficulties, causing some of our online services to operate slower than usual or be temporarily unavailable. We are working diligently to resolve the issue and sincerely regret the inconvenience."
FedEx is currently experiencing an elevated error rate. SmartPost does not appear to be affected at this time. Engineers are investigating.
Tracker reports are fully caught up.
We're seeing delays generating Tracker reports again. Other report types are not affected.
This incident has been resolved.
Shipment reports have now caught up. Tracker reports should be caught up shortly.
All queues are processing and we expect all reports to be generated in the next few hours.
Engineers have identified a performance problem with Tracker reports; Refund, CashFlow, and PaymentLog reports are caught up.
EasyPost is aware of an issue causing delays generating Refund, Shipment, Tracker, and PaymentLog reports. Engineers are investigating.
This incident has been resolved.
UPS has resolved their issues. Engineers will continue to monitor.
Some customers are currently experiencing timeouts retrieving rates from UPS. EasyPost engineers are investigating.

incidents.name: Elevated errors and timeouts from LaserShip

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
LaserShip appears to have resolved their upstream issues as of ~13:20 Pacific time.
EasyPost engineers are currently investigating elevated timeouts and errors from lasership.

EasyPost served a number of errors for approximately 27 seconds due to a failover of a network device. All systems are currently fully operational. Customers who experienced errors should retry their requests.
Everything's been stable for the last 90 minutes; this incident is resolved.
DHL eCommerce performance has returned to normal as of approximately 16:20 Pacific time. Engineers continue to monitor the situation.
Upstream DHL performance for shipment purchases is still showing degraded performance; rating and tracking do not seem to be affected at this time.
We are currently experiencing timeouts and degraded performance contacting DHL eCommerce. Engineers are investigating.
The issue has been discovered and resolved
The networking issue has resolved, engineers are continuing to investigate and monitor the situation.
Engineers have identified a network issue between data centers.
Engineers are investigating performance degradation

components.name: Address Verification
components.description: Address Verification (both standalone and part of label creation)

incident_updates.body: There have been no recurrences and we are now considering this issue fully resolved.
AWS has deployed a fix and we're seeing error rates dropping off. Engineers continue to monitor the situation.

AWS, a large Internet infrastructure provider, is currently experiencing a major outage. This is not directly impacting EasyPost, but does impact some of our service providers. You may experience issues creating new accounts, making changes to payment methods, and interacting with some carriers who are themselves hosted on AWS. Engineers are closely monitoring the situation.
FedEx has implemented a fix. This incident is resolved.
FedEx has identified the issue and is working to resolve it.

The FedEx Fulfillment authentication API is experiencing an outage. FedEx Fulfillment functionality that requires authentication is unavailable at this time. No other FedEx products appear to be affected.
All batch jobs are caught up
Batch shipment creation and other asynchronous jobs are currently somewhat delayed due to elevated load. Engineers are investigating.
This incident has been resolved.
FedEx is responding to some rate and label API calls. Users should retry their requests, though performance may still be degraded. Our engineers continue to monitor the situation.
FedEx's API is not responding to requests. Rates, labels, pickups and tracking for FedEx are unavailable at this time.
Webhook queues are fully caught-up.
We are currently investigating elevated latency connecting outbound to some domains for webhook delivery. Events may be delayed.
This incident has been resolved for the last hour.

We stuffered a network partition in one datacenter causing split-brain for approximately one minute. This issue has been resolved and all systems are fully operational. EasyPost Engineers continue to monitor the situation. Any customers who received errors should retry their requests.
Engineers are investigating elevated error rates to some endpoints

components.name: Address Verification
components.description: Address Verification (both standalone and part of label creation)

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
Canada Post's API is serving requests again. We will continue to monitor its performance.
The Canda Post API is experiencing a partial outage. Rates and labels may be unavailable, and tracking updates will be delayed. Engineers are monitoring the situation.
All webhook delivery has caught up.
Webhook delivery peaked at approximately 48 minutes delayed but is catching up now. Engineers are continuing to monitor.
Webhook event sending is currently delayed by up to approximately 30 minutes. Engineers are investigating.
This incident has been resolved.
This incident appears to have been resolved upstream. EasyPost engineers are continuing to monitor the situation.
We have confirmed that this outage is due to an upstream provider's outage and will provide updates as they are available.
International address verification is currently returning an elevated error rate.

components.name: Address Verification
components.description: Address Verification (both standalone and part of label creation)

incident_updates.body: EasyPost suffered an elevated error rate for approximately two minutes between 16:59PDT and 17:01PDT due to a network failover. Customers who received errors should retry their requests.
This incident has been resolved.
We are currently experiencing elevated error levels with OnTrac. Our engineers are diligently monitoring the issue.
The UPS test API has recovered.
Clarification: this issue only affects *test mode* UPS shipments.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.
We are currently experiencing an elevated rate of failures when purchasing shipments via the UPS test API. Production shipments are not affected. Engineers are monitoring the situation.
Asynchronous tasks are caught up. Engineers will continue to monitor during the day.
Some asynchronous actions (including batch creation and purchase and scan form creation) are delayed. Engineers are investigating.
OSM Worldwide tracking updates are flowing again.
The carrier OSM Worldwide is experiencing a tracking outage.  Our engineers are monitoring the situation.
This incident has been resolved.
Response times for the DHL eCommerce (DHLECS) rating API have partially recovered, but are still significantly above normal. DHL is aware of the issue and is working on a fix.
The DHL eCommerce (DHLECS) rating API is experiencing elevated response times and error rates. Engineers are investigating.
We have seen no further issues with FedEx and this incident is now resolved.
FedEx's systems are coming online but are still approximately 50% slower than before the outage. EasyPost engineers continue to monitor the situation.
We have implemented a mitigation and are no longer experiencing performance issues or errors for non-FedEx requests. FedEx's backend is still experiencing an outage.
FedEx is timing out and causing elevated failure rates and poor performance across our API, including shipment and tracker creation. Engineers are implementing mitigations now.
EasyPost is currently receiving an elevated rate of errors from the FedEx backend. Engineers are investigating.
This incident has been resolved. Everything has been stable since 01:22Z
Engineers have identified the issue and have made the necessary changes. We are continuing to monitor this event.
We are experiencing networking issues at one of our edge datacenters. Engineers are investigating.

components.name: Address Verification
components.description: Address Verification (both standalone and part of label creation)

incident_updates.body: Asynchronous tasks are caught up. Engineers will continue to monitor during the day.
Some asynchronous actions (including batch creation and purchase and scan form creation) are delayed. Engineers are investigating.
This issue has been resolved
EasyPost is currently experiencing an outage generating some FedEx labels. Engineers are investigating.
